item.title: Managing databases users using nix
item.description: How to manage data users, specifically for MySQL/MariaDB using Nix. The process involved declaring user configurations, creating scripts to apply configurations and automating the process with systemd.
item.dc:creator: Michal Parusinski

item.title: Publishing a pelican website using nix
item.description: How to publish a static website using Nix, specifically a website genrated with Pelican and managed with Nix Flakes.
item.dc:creator: Michal Parusinski

item.title: Managing secrets in Nix using Agenix
item.description: How to manage secrets in a Nix configuration using Agenix, a tool built on top of the age encryption tool.
item.dc:creator: Michal Parusinski

item.title: Converting Archlinux with BTRFS into NixOS
item.description: How to convert an Arch Linux system using a Btrfs filesystem into a NixOS system without reformatting or using a USB live distro.
item.dc:creator: Michal Parusinski
